Text:
This sounds super interesting, I know you only upload anime you like, so is there anything you could compare this to? I'm downloading it either way, but just out of curiosity. 

Also, I bought Part 2 of Steins;Gate and just want to say to everyone waiting, it's definitely worth the wait. Better yet, it's worth the buy.

Its similar to One piece and DBZ.
And its good you went out and bought part 2 of steins gate, Its really worth the money and you also support Funimation.

Yeah I just noticed the top of the box art read that it's from that studio, clearly a must-watch for me.

Absolutely, I want to start collecting my favorite anime that I haven't yet on blu-rays (or DVDs if I must, like Darker Than Black), so I feel like Steins;Gate was the ice breaker in that regard.

Thanks for all your work, btw.

The manga of this (in my opinion) is great and way better then the show. The show will diverge a lot from the original story line and add extra people that'll re-occur throughout the show that never show in the manga. But thats just how I feel cause I started on the manga. I'm sure there are a lot of people who'll like this series. I'm downloading it cause a voice actor I like is in it. A great upload like always. Will you be uploading Baka and Test Season 2 anytime soon?
Just watched HOrrible story about getting food and capturing rare animals i didnt like it but im sure .audio andl. Audio and video were both 10!

the story is actually pretty good later on, thats how Long running series are, Naruto, Bleach onepiece are all the same. 

Toriko's story does not unfold untill Late 30s episodes
any adea when part two is gunna be upped?? it was released on feb 5th lol im broke ass otherwise id already have it
